impinges on your retina it interacts first with a protein called rhodopsin. A
typical cell contains thousands and thousands of different types of proteins to
perform the many tasks necessary for life, much like a carpenter’s workshop
might contain many different kinds of tools for various carpentry tasks.
What do these versatile tools look like? The basic structure of proteins is
